# ScopedAttributeContainer

**Structure**

An attribute container that allows dynamic member lookup of its contents within the specified attribute scope.

## Declaration

```swift
@dynamicMemberLookup struct ScopedAttributeContainer<S> where S : AttributeScope
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ScopedAttributeContainer] when you need to disambiguate between attributes that exist in several attribute scopes that your app uses.

## Accessing Attribute Keys

- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the value of the attribute that the specified key path indicates.

## Using Defined Attributes

- **AttributeScopes**: Collections of attributes that system frameworks define.
- **AttributeDynamicLookup**: A type to support dynamic member lookup of attributes and containers.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
